What is sofbox ?

Sofbox is a sleek, clean and powerful landing page template

High Resolution

Provided with high resolution images.

Color Schemes

You can use color schemes as you need.

Google Fonts

You can change the fonts of the website.

Clean Codes

Clean code which can be understood.

What can sofbox do ?

You can fully customize the template with ease. Every page is fully responsive and retina ready which makes your creation look good on any device.

Sofbox’s harmonious design and super clean looks will make your website look beautiful and elegant.
